page.title: 19A day in Felton School.
page.content: When we come to school we can play outside.When the bell rings we come inside and read quietly to ourselves.Then we go into Assembley,we sing hymns and say prayers and have a story.Then we do writing or dictionary or comprehension.After milk we go out to play.After playtime we usually do maths.Sometimes we watch a television programme and we write and work on what we have learnt from T.V. After dinner we sometimes do some work on magnets or weights.We make working models like cars with batteries .Some afternoons we do craft work and work on projects like Normans Sometimes we have netball or football or rounders out in the yard or on the field if it is dry.We have P.E. or drama in the hall if we do not go outside.We went into the village to make maps when we made compasses.
